{{ $url := "https://github.com/" }} {{ $repo := print .Site.Params.githubUser "/" .Site.Params.githubRepo }} About this project See the project on GitHub {{ if .Page.Section }} {{ if .Page.File }} {{ $sectiontag := print "section-" (substr (replace (index (split (lower .Page.File) "/") 0) ".md" "") 3) }} {{ $lessontag := print "module-" (substr (replace (index (split (lower .Page.File) "/") 1) ".md" "") 3) }} {{ $statustag := print "status-" .Page.Params.status }} {{ $labels := print $sectiontag "," $lessontag "," $statustag ",feedback"}} {{ $source := print $url $repo "/blob/main/content/" (replace .Page.File ".md" ".jl") }} {{ $issue := print $url $repo "/issues/new?labels=" $labels "&assignees=@" .Site.Params.githubUser "&title=ADD A DESCRIPTIVE TITLE" "&body= **Description of your problem/comments**\n\n*Do not edit below this point*" "\n\n[💻 SOURCE][src]\n\n" "[src]: " $source "\n\n[📔 PAGE][prm]\n\n" "[prm]: " .Page.Permalink "\n\n📦 " $sectiontag "\n\n🏷️ " $lessontag }} Provide feedback on this module {{ end }} {{ end }} CC-BY .40 (Timothée Poisot)
